ComicInfo.Title: Brainwashed!; Curse of the Warlock!; Everyone's Paralyzed... But Me!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 19:13:08. [Issue ID 20218]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Penciller: Kurt Schaffenberger,Pete Costanza,Steve Ditko,Ogden Whitney,Pete Costanza,Steve Ditko,Ogden Whitney
ComicInfo.Inker: Kurt Schaffenberger,Tom Hickey,Sal Trapani,Ogden Whitney,Tom Hickey,Sal Trapani,Ogden Whitney
ComicInfo.Summary:
Brainwashed!: The alien Kruzians invade Earth and their queen hypnotizes Magicman into helping them.
Curse of the Warlock!: A warlock's curse on a hunter causes one of the hunter's sons to be born evil, but everyone mistakes which one it is.
Everyone's Paralyzed... But Me!: Eddie Phillips is a shy and timid boy who gets a visit from Mr. Destiny, who helps him take a chance and be recognized for what he can be.
ComicInfo.Writer: Zev Zimmer,Bob Standish,Greg Olivetti,Zev Zimmer,Bob Standish,Greg Olivetti
